text_good_morning.description: Text for the morning greeting. This should be as short as possible, preferably two short words.

text_good_afternoon.description: Text for the afternoon greeting. This should be as short as possible, preferably two short words.

button_text_hide_description.description: Text for the button that allows users to hide full details of certain show or movie.
